title: Zephyr Fish
summaries: The Zephyr Fish is a pet-summoning item, which summons the Zephyr Fish pet. It is rarely caught from fishing in any body of water. The chance to catch it is 0.06*2/3125 (0.06%) with 50% Fishing Power and 0.13*4/3125 (0.13%) with 100% Fishing Power.
(Old-gen console and 3DS versions) This pet will not teleport to the player when it is far away, unlike most other pets.

statistics.Sell: 3 GC
